---
category: news
title: "Pedestrians pose challenge for autonomous vehicles"
excerpt: "Already some cars have automatic speed control and braking, based on detection of vehicles close by. But pedestrians are the bigger challenge. They are less predictable. The Institute for Transport Studies at the University of Leeds has both a simulator for vehicles and now one for pedestrians."
